website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few issues, this mascara offers notable wear time along with the ability to make lashes look darker, longer, and fuller.
pros: Formulated to lengthen and volumize lashes
Although it's not waterproof, it stays on throughout the day and doesn't typically smudge
Brush has unique bristles that are designed to coat even the smallest lashes
cons: Sticky and tends to result in clumps
Takes some time to dry on the lashes, yet the product dries out fairly quickly in the tube

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This was such a disappointment! I so wanted a brand with the reputation it has to set my lashes off and make them look long and beautiful! Instead it came with lashes already stuck to the wand! Now no where did I see it say that it was a lash extension mascara so I don't think it was fibers! Either way, the formula was super thick and didn't smell so good! I want to say it was actually a knock-off I don't think the real urban decay would have looked the way it did or go on the way it did!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: After reading glowing reviews of this product, I was excited to try it. However, it really did not deliver the thick, stunning lashes it claims. The worst part about it is the stupid, rubbery wand which makes the mascara glob onto my lashes, creating the dreaded spider lash look. It does not thicken my lashes, in fact it makes my already thin lashes stick together and look even thinner. It was slightly better when I replaced the horrible wand with a brush wand from a different mascara, but the formula was still pretty bad. This is way too expensive of a price for a product that doesn't work well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package looked like it was returned and opened
customer_reviews.text: The mascara came and looked like the package was previously opened and returned. This was purchased to be given as a Pollyanna gift and now I am embarrassed to gift this present.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: I hated this mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara was probably one of the worst I have ever tried. You could barely tell I was wearing mascara. I definitely would not purchase this again, in fact I only used it twice (the second time I really tried to get it to work). If your're looking for a good mascara I would recommend Tarteist Lash Paint Mascara or URBAN DECAY Perversion (though I like Tarteist more. Honestly, most drug store brands are better than this trash.
customer_reviews.author: kirstie Squires

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara again
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 more of these because I absolutely am in love with the way it makes my lashes look!
customer_reviews.author: PKF

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: The box had been opened and mascara had been used. I found eyelashes on the wand. I love this brand of mascara but I think it is tampered with by seller. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Renick

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara and Ulta doesn’t carry it any more. It helps and spreads out your lashes without clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Painful applicator.
customer_reviews.text: Bristles feel like needles..hurt with application. Makes eyelashes brittle. Takes many applications to apply...i don't even think i will finish it. I will return to my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara I ever used. Full and long lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: For all they hype and the price of this mascara I was severely disappointed. It ended up being very clumpy and flakes off my lashes fast. I had to touch up under my eyes all day.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: False look
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this as a substitute to apply false eye lashes. I
customer_reviews.author: vonxojn

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: I love the spiky brush. The mascara is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a really cool case. Really love this product. Not clumpy. Gives you long, full lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Taya

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: One of the most *enduring* mascaras I’ve ever used, as it were.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith von B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara! The brush is easy to use, and is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mascara. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: shae churchman

customer_reviews.title: UD Mascara, the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Besides being a great mascara, the mascara brush is the seller for me, love it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick when applied
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t go on well. Brush is awkward. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: I have very short eyelashes and have tried MANY mascaras ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very short eyelashes and have tried MANY mascaras. I usually use waterproof only. I must say that I am using this and have reordered. It only smears if I am having an allergy attack..
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Whoo hooo...love this!
customer_reviews.text: After I divorced my eyelash extensions, I was left with some short stubby’s that hurt my very soul. This mascara saved the day. Good length, nice volume, great brush that gets every lash and no clumps! I looked like I had my extensions back! I’ll stick with this version of long lashes that I can wash off every night!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: NOT for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this due to rave reviews plus my grown daughter used this so I bought it.. BURNED my eyes so. BADLY I had to wash off immediately re applying ALL my make up my eyes tested so BADLY! I have sensitive eyes and this is NOT for me. I am returning it today for a refund.,
customer_reviews.author: KitKat62

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have pale lashes and this stuff really works to bring them out. Love that it doesn't smudge like all the other masacaras. Only wish it lasted longer- O think this is smaller than normal mascara bottles because it doesn't last as long as others would.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite mascara for awhile now so was happy to get it for a great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: Incredible mascara
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I’ve ever used in my 45 years of Using makeup . Unfortunately it’s discontinued 😤
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: The best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mascaras to ever coat my lashes! I recommend this specific mascara to everyone looking to try a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Hart

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is amazing!!! This is now a staple for me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Norris

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend and she loved it, she’s happy so I’m happy. Also it got here fast and in perfect condition, came with a thank you for purchasing note.
customer_reviews.author: Cody brown

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: 11/10 mascara. Got hit by a truck or whatever, broke my pelvis in 6 different spots, broke both my ankles, but through my lip & knocked out unconscious. Rushed to shock trauma and my eyelashes still looked as good as they did when I first put it on. 😎
customer_reviews.author: remieboyz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst crap I’ve ever tried. Got it on, lashes went flat. Then it itched and after trying to take it off with makeup remover I had black flakes all inside my eye. Never ever again. I won’t let this crap come within 50 feet of my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Worst mascara I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Truly disgusting. The wand is awful and just spiky and looks like pieces are falling off or my lashes are being pulled out and sticking to it. Sticky and takes a long time to dry. Leaves my lashes flat and straight and stuck together. You’re better off with anything else
customer_reviews.author: tjacobs

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it more than 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for the first tume last night, and it definitely lives up to the hype! Dancing, sweating, sleeping...nothing phased it! I usually wear waterproof formulas and still end up with smudges on my upper lids, but Troublemake performed flawlessly! Definitely sex-proof, as advertised! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wallace

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dries out too fast. Burns eyes when I was mascara off.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

product_meta.title: Ud Troublemaker Super-Fat, Super-Long, Sex-Proof # 13.7x Lash Volume Mascara 0.25 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Get super-long, sexy, fluttery, intensely black lashes. This mascara is so good it should be illegal.

Our failsafe formula lengthens as it separates, while our custom brush grabs onto lashes, curling as it coats. We loaded up this mascara with insane benefits—for impossibly long, perfectly fanned-out lashes.

Start stirring up trouble with your badass lashes—this mascara will outlast even the most scandalous nights. This formula layers beautifully without clumping, so pile on as many coats as you want. The more Trouble, the better.

Our totally-tech formula contains two different types of black pigments, giving it an intensity that’s blacker than your darkest thoughts (that’s pretty black, isn’t it?). We infused Troublemaker Mascara with a combination of hollow silica and ultralight fibers to volumize without weighing down your lashes. Vitamin E and panthenol nourish and condition, and a combination of polymers helps the mascara adhere to your lashes for lasting wear—no flaking, smearing or smudging.

Our killer custom brush is unlike any you’ve ever tried. We designed it to comb and separate lashes to make it look like you have more of them! Tiny precision hooks grab lashes to pull the product through—for an instant lash-multiplying effect. The brush actually fans out lashes as it coats them, separating and curling each lash while laying down the perfect amount of mascara. And it’s designed to reach even tiny inner-corner lashes, no matter which way you hold it.

Troublemaker Mascara comes in a double-walled, faceted tube with a prismatic finish.

Urban Decay is 100% cruelty-free.

Fill Weight: 7.3 g POIDS NET/NET WT. 0.25 oz
feature_bullets: Get super-long, sexy, fluttery, intensely black lashes.
This mascara is so good it should be illegal.
Troublemaker Mascara comes in a double-walled, faceted tube with a prismatic finish.
